ooC: I guess I was waiting for nothing... I had thought that more 
than two or three people were controlling Predacons in this fight.

-- Megatron --

Megatron ducks the first missile, and the second explodes at his 
feet in front of him, blowing him backwards. The Pred Leader ignores 
his damages, and leaps up transforming into dragon form. He quickly 
starts accelerating away from the Maximal base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He is blated in the stomach by the two plasma shots. This causes 
him to double over, as the rockets pass over him.
> 
> He watches as Megatron calls for a retreat.
> 
> He fires two rockets at the retreating Predacon leader.
> 
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup pulls up out side the Maximal base. He transformes to bot 
mode, and goes in, searching for the disturbance.
